thread.title: A Statuesque Shoebill Stork Sweetly Mimics the Movements of a Visiting Keeper
thread.title_full: A Statuesque Shoebill Stork Sweetly Mimics the Movements of a Visiting Keeper

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Statuesque Shoebill Stork Sweetly Mimics the Movements of a Visiting Keeper
text:
A wonderfully prehistoric-looking shoebill stork very sweetly watched and mimicked the movements of a visiting keeper . Such movements included bowing, head shaking and head nodding. The statuesque bird also chattered away for a bit, much to the amusement of the keeper. 

via reddit
